lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso's imminent retirement from Formula One is a real possibility, world champion Lewis Hamilton said, adding that he hoped the Spaniard would decide to carry on.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Says Alonso Retirement Is a Real Possibility
headline.main: Hamilton Says Alonso Retirement Is a Real Possibility

snippet: Fernando Alonso's imminent retirement from Formula One is a real possibility, world champion Lewis Hamilton said, adding that he hoped the Spaniard would decide to carry on....
